__e: It is good that warriors such as we meet in the struggle of life or death.
I'm going to raid England again. And I'm looking for warriors, like you and like you, to join me.
It may be too late to convince him of his mistake. But there are several other warriors who feel as I do.
Okay, so have I. So has every other person in this regiment, both fighters and civilians. I had you pegged the first time I saw you.
Send warriors and have him brought back at once.
Your brothers were warriors, both of them dead at the hands of those you seem so eager to protect.
"The strongest of all warriors are these two-- time and patience."
I can only hope with all the world's warriors gathered against us there might be one down there who's up to the task.
You and your warriors are as welcome to us as spring after the hardest and most bitter winter.
